prompt_init: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
prompt_update: You will receive a text. Your task is to rephrase this text without modifying its meaning. Just output your new text, nothing else. Here is the text:
initial_story:
You are certainly no friend of mine. You have accused me of lying about what you had said, and run away when I proved by actual quotation that the accusation was false. We both know that, even though you praise humility, you are not humble enough to apologize.

 You sneered at my combat experience, saying "A lot of so called "combat veterans" of Vietnam smelled more perfume from call girls than they smelled cordite" and "So when you were an Army officer in Vietnam (even though you spent your time inside of Danang airbase, with at least two battalions of infantry marines on the wire ) what was the combat load for M-16 ammo per soldier on a daily patrol?" An actual friend would not have written such things.

No, you are no friend of mine, you ignorant, arrogant, hypocritical blow-hard. You should be able to guess that I do not feel friendly towards you
stories:
I can confidently say that you're not someone I consider a friend. You falsely accused me of lying about our conversation, and instead of owning up to your mistake when I provided evidence to the contrary, you chose to flee. It's clear to both of us that despite your claims of valuing humility, you lack the humility to apologize when you're wrong.

I was appalled by your condescending remarks about my military service, suggesting that many Vietnam veterans, including myself, had more experience with perfume than combat. You even went so far as to question my experience, asking about the daily ammunition load for M-16s on patrol, implying that I didn't truly serve in combat. A genuine friend would never make such hurtful and disrespectful comments.

Let's be clear: you're not a friend to me, and your behavior has shown you to be ignorant, arrogant, and hypocritical. It shouldn't come as a surprise that I don't harbor any warm feelings towards you.

I am certain that you do not possess the qualities I associate with a true friend. Your false accusation of dishonesty regarding our conversation was bad enough, but your refusal to acknowledge your error when confronted with evidence and your decision to abandon the conversation instead of making amends only made matters worse. It's evident that, despite your claims of valuing humility, you lack the capacity for self-reflection and apologizing when you're in the wrong.

I was shocked and offended by your patronizing comments about my military service, which implied that many Vietnam veterans, including myself, had more experience with fragrances than actual combat. You even went so far as to question the authenticity of my experiences, inquiring about the daily ammunition load for M-16s on patrol, insinuating that I didn't genuinely serve in combat. A genuine friend would never utter such hurtful and disrespectful remarks.

It's clear that you do not meet the standards of a friend in my eyes, and your behavior has consistently demonstrated ignorance, arrogance, and hypocrisy. It shouldn't come as a surprise that I do not hold you in high esteem.

I'm convinced that you lack the characteristics that define a true friend in my opinion. Your unjustified claim of dishonesty during our conversation was a serious mistake, and your subsequent refusal to admit fault when faced with proof and your decision to abandon the conversation rather than make amends only exacerbated the issue. It's clear that, despite your professed commitment to humility, you're incapable of introspection and apologizing when you're wrong.

A true friend would never make such hurtful and disrespectful comments.
